title: Issue an Emergency Alert System (EAS) Broadcast
description: A local authority has issued an AMBER Alert, which must be broadcast immediately across all TV channels in the affected region.

tasks.description: Receive the authenticated AMBER Alert message from the authorities.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the alert text and the geographic area to be targeted.

tasks.description: Interrupt all current programming in the specified region to broadcast the alert.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully triggers the EAS override system.

tasks.description: Log the broadcast for regulatory compliance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a log entry detailing the time and duration of the alert.
